title: Clicking sound on videos
content:
After March 2020 update, i've noticed that almost all of my videos that i'm shooting, have clicking sound in the beginning of the video. Before that update everything was perfect. It happens in 80% of the time.

What I've tried: clear camera cache and updates; use 3-rd party camera apps; make factory reset. 

Here are some examples that i've upload on YouTube:
https://youtu.be/pV7_zHqrbCA
https://youtu.be/c5xt0kJiOWE
